PartyProfileAddress.name: PartyProfileAddress
PartyProfileAddress.description: Represents information about the address of the party.

AddressType.description: Specifies the type of party address.

City.description: The city detail for the address. For example, this field is known as MailingCity on Contact.

Country.description: The country detail for the address. For example, this field is known as MailingCountry on Contact.

GeocodeAccuracy.description: The level of accuracy of a location’s geographical coordinates compared with its physical address. A geocoding service typically provides this value based on the address’s latitude and longitude coordinates.

IsPrimaryAddress.description: Indicates whether the party's address is the primary address.

IsCurrentAddress.description: Indicates whether the party profile address is the current address (true) or not (false).

IsPermanentAddress.description: Indicates whether the address of the party profile is a permanent address (true) or not (false).

IsVerified.description: The status of the party profile address verification.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Latitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address. For example, this field is known as MailingLatitude on Contact.

Longitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address. For example, this field is known as MailingLongitude on Contact.

Name.description: The name of the party profile address record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

PartyProfileId.description: The party profile that's associated with the address.

PostalCode.description: The postal code for the address. For example, this field is known as MailingPostalCode on Contact.

State.description: The state detail for the address. For example, this field is known as MailingState on Contact.

Street.description: The street detail for the address. For example, this field is known as MailingStreet on Contact.

ValidityEndDate.description: The date when the party profile address becomes valid.

ValidityStartDate.description: The date until when the party profile address is valid.

VerificationDate.description: The date when the party profile address was verified.
